about_the_game:
The Rising is a narrative, exploration-based game with traces of survival.

Step into the paws of a dog. Your mission is to spy on suspicious humans living in the city.
Eavesdrop on their conversations, watch old tapes, register their hideouts and scan their documents.
Each dog's brain is neuronally hacked, ensuring that the information you collect is automatically transmitted to a Giant Worm that controls the city.
Understanding the city's dynamics is crucial for gathering intelligence, as events in the Ziggurat city are tied to specific time slots.

PRAISE BE THE DAY OF THE RISING.

FEATURES

  • 6 different characters to play
  • An entire city to explore.
  • Survive: Smell, follow trails, hunt, eat, sleep, bury and dig.
  • Night & day cycle.
  • Enjoy the charm of hand-drawn artwork.
  • Snitch on humans! The Great Worm wants to know everything.
  • You can pet people (as long as they don’t try to kill you).

About Pirita Studio

THE RAISING is the latest project from Pirita Studio, a two-person studio based in Madrid, founded by Beatriz Gascón and Juan Pablo González.
